content: I’m a continuous improvement coach and I don’t think people resent the visualization stuff on itself. They resent it as extra work only if it doesn’t lead to improvement. Which, sadly, is often the case. As you said, people know they’re overworked. But showing how much, where and how should help management define priorities between that precise work and improvement. Which is more work of course and thus have a high chance of being resented as well if not clarified with people whom in involves.
